parameter.name: longAlpha
α
parameter.comment:
Determines how the effect tries to adapt to background changes.
If the background does not change, then try to use 0 (requires the first frame to represent background only, without your light sources).

parameter.name: lightOpacity
Opacity
parameter.comment:
Basic opacity for a light source.
For slowly moving light source try to use a lower opacity value to obtain smoother results.

parameter.name: opacitySmoothing
Smoothing
parameter.comment:
Smoothing of the light map according to the light source.
A value of 1 results in absolutely smooth transitions from background to light source, but might result in too weak lights. The maximum value gives sharper edges and stronger lights.

parameter.name: backgroundWeight
Background Weight
parameter.comment: Strength of the (calculated) background image. Setting it to 100 paints the light mask directly over the background, without any person in the image if the video starts with a «clean» background image.

parameter.name: thresholdBrightness
Brightness Threshold
parameter.comment:
Determines how bright (R+G+B) a light source needs to be in order to be recognized as light source.
Increasing this threshold requires brighter light sources (i.e. more white or less color, respectively) but prevents some «false alarms» where semi-bright parts, e.g. hands where colors can change quite a lot compared to the background, are incorrectly recognized as light source.

parameter.name: thresholdDifference
Difference Threshold
parameter.comment:
Similar to the brightness threshold, but for the brightness difference (max(dR, dG, dB)) relative to the calculated background.
Increasing this threshold makes it harder for light sources to be accepted on bright backgrounds, but decreases the danger of noise counting as light source.

parameter.name: thresholdDiffSum
Difference Sum Threshold
parameter.comment:
Threshold for the differences summed up (dR + dG + dB).
Raising this value might, in some cases, avoid that some light objects lit by the light source are added to the light mask.

parameter.name: dim
Dimming
parameter.comment: Dims the light mask. Lights will leave a fainting trail if it is set to a value > 0.
